name:S‚Äça‚Äçm‚Äça‚Äçn‚Äçt‚Äçh‚Äça
info:Deluxe Twin Room
info:Stayed in December 2023
info:Family
info:1 Review
rating:5
posted:Posted January 15, 2024
msg:1. Location is fantastic. Within walking distance to the shopping street and the forbidden city.  The subway station is just below the shopping mall next door.  If you want shopping, food and site-see, this location is the most convenient!
2. The front desk and the concierge are the 2 services that we troubled regularly during our stay of 6 nights. All Chinese site-seeing locations must be pre-booked and the applications are only Chinese-nationals friendly.  Without a Chinese ID or a Chinese mobile number, it was impossible to help yourselves, even though we had Wechat and Alipay pre-installed and tested before we left Singapore.
3. Front desk team, Leon was the one who checked us in.  He struggled to find us rooms on the same floor due to the peak season (23-29 Dec).  We were given rooms on separate floor but he gave us lift access to both floors and apologized profusely for the wait and gave us vouchers for drinks at the cafe, which we did not use.
4. Concierge team led by Elvis with Alan and Wendy helping, was a fantastic team. Elvis had to use his mobile to help us book Great-Wall tickets, which we paid him through WeChat.  During which, someone wanted his help, but he politely tell the guy to wait since he has started helping us first.  Polite and put his point across without creating a scene.
5. Alan from the concierge team was the one that got us a table at their Christmas eve dinner.  They first offered us a 4-seater table squeezing in 6, to be shared with another 2.  We turned down the offer and was prepared to end up eating street food or order room service.  But on the day itself, he saw us coming back and offered us another table, because they decided to add in more tables, which we took.  It was a fantastic buffet dinner with free flow of alcohol and drinks.  The highlight was the cutting of a huge blue-fin tuna.  The price for the dinner per pax (don't remember how much now) was a fraction of what have to pay in Singapore.  The amount of alcohol and  tuna sashimi that we had was enough to recoup the dinner price !
6. Another observation (now that we have been to Harbin Shangrila after Beijing, we have a comparison) : at the breakfast restaurant, the reception could recognize us on the 2nd day, and remembered our room numbers and that we are family of 4! The training of service staff paying such attention to details can only mean that they believe in service to the core.
7. If you are going to Beijing, consider no where else but Hilton at Wangfujing.  I know I will be there again !
----------------------------------------

name:G‚Äçe‚Äçr‚Äçm‚Äça‚Äçi‚Äçn‚Äçe
info:Executive Deluxe Queen Room
info:Stayed in September 2023
info:Family
info:2 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted September 5, 2023
msg:Hilton Beijing Wangfujing was certainly value for money compared to our previous stay at Novotel. Location - It is adjacent to APM Beijing and the Wangfujing walking street. Definitely accessible to shopping for all the brand names. Jinyuhutong station along subway Line 8 is about 6min walk. Food: Food wise, there are plenty of choices though price wise they are targeted to tourists. Service: Excellent attention and service from all staff. Most are conversant in English. Breakfast buffet is pretty decent. My booking entitled 2 to the hi-tea and happy hours at the executive lounge. Quite a good selection of food and drinks during happy hour. Hi-tea was a little of a let down... wish there was better finger food selection. Overall, we will recommend this hotel to anyone looking to stay in thus area.

msg:The address is strategically located. It is very convenient to go to Xiehe Medical Association. On the left side of the door, across the road, is Xiehe, a 5-minute walk. On the right is the shopping mall, a 3-minute walk. The sunny room was very comfortable. The only problem was that there was a mirror facing the bed, which made me a little scared at night. The Chinese food in the hotel tastes average, the mustard duck feet are fishy, ‚Äã‚Äãand the dishes are salty. The hotel is good. This is the first time I have been dissatisfied with this booking in the 20 years I have been using Ctrip. For hotels with a discount of 15% off and 25% off for diamonds, the price is the same regardless of whether you book a hotel with a black diamond, diamond, ordinary card, silver or gold card. A friend accidentally discovered this problem while having a meal. I have been on the phone for a week about this issue. Ctrip‚Äôs previous replies were all about other people having coupons and technology to deal with it, but their attitude was very good. Today, this customer service officer said that ordinary users would still book flights and trains to enjoy lower prices, so he could not take care of my needs. His tone was a bit disdainful and convinced, and the implication was that I was asking for too much. If the user level cannot be reflected in the price, then you should not promote it like this, let alone the hotel's reminder of the discount for diamond cards. Now tell me, all prices are the same, and the discount price written on the discount is also the same for all levels. Then are you defrauding consumers? If you advertise that your level is reflected in services such as fast security check and points acceleration without any price concessions, then no one will argue with you. Looking at the comparison pictures on Xiaohongshu that say Ctrip is familiar with it, the attitude of this customer service person today really irritated me. The hotel service is very good, especially the front desk service is very thoughtful. After learning about my previous night's experience, they will ask me what requirements I have for the room, take the initiative to arrange a satisfactory room for me, and solve problems in time
The breakfast service is also very polite. The breakfast variety is quite satisfactory, not very rich, and basically all Chinese style, but the quality is definitely good. Unlike some other hotel breakfasts that look rich, but the taste is very poor, especially the egg stall The chef, the scrambled eggs are very good, but it would be better if there are more Western-style things
Finally, the room is a little bit old, but the maintenance is not bad, that is, the room 1031 I live in, whether it is the gauze curtain or the blackout curtain, it is a bit dirty, especially there is a big pool of stains on the gauze curtain , hope to clean up in time

msg:I have never given a negative review before, and I have to give him a negative review this time. ÔøºStayed in this hotel once a few years ago. At that time, I felt that the location was good and the service was very good. I chose this hotel without hesitation for this trip to Beijing. I originally booked one night and went to the front desk to add two extra nights. That night When I checked in, I felt the aging of the facilities (which makes sense when you think about it, after all, the hotel is more than ten years old). However, as a five-star hotel without even a USB socket, you can imagine how many facilities this has. It was lagging behind. The service behind it was simply shocking. I felt very hot and stuffy in the middle of the night. I tried to turn on the air conditioner and adjust the mode. Adjusting the wind speed still couldn't solve the problem. It was so stuffy that I couldn't sleep at all. I called room service and the waiter It's all like this. This is a central air conditioner. What's the logic behind the central air conditioner not blowing out air? He said he would help us open the windows for ventilation. At that time, the temperature in Beijing was -3 degrees at night. Later, at my request, the manager on duty took care of us. A maintenance worker came up, took a thermometer and measured it. He said that the temperature was normal. Everyone's body temperature was different. The quilt was too thick. In short, there was no problem with the hotel. It was our problem, and The poor service attitude and tone of voice are not apologetic at all, which gives the guests the feeling that we just can't stay here, so you can do whatever you want! When I decided to check out the next morning, I also mentioned it to the front desk. I said that the service and environment of your hotel are really bad. The front desk clerk just glared at me and didn't say a word. No. I asked about the reason and no one said a word like sorry! ÔøºI will not choose to stay in this hotel anyway! Having said this, I hope to help more people. Don‚Äôt get too carried away. Traveling is not easy. I hope everyone has a pleasant trip!

Let's give a real review of the hotel. The equipment is very old, the cabinets are worn out, the floor is also stained, and the stains on the sofa are clearly visible. There were flies flying around that night, so I put up with it. When I went to the bathroom at night, I was really smelled by the smell of the bathroom, and I felt very uncomfortable. After all, the room was more than 1600 for one night, and I reported the problem to the front desk. The front desk changed my room the next day, but the cabinets were also worn out, the floor was stained, and the stains on the sofa were visible. I had no expectations. I went to the bathroom to check, but there was still a smell. It should be the sewer anti-taste. I also talked to the waiter, and the feedback given to me is that the hotel has not been renovated since it opened. I feel that this has become their only answer to the outside world. Of course, it is not their fault. After all, they are employees, and the key is the upper management. Take it seriously. When I checked out, I heard that the front desk received calls from other visitors. From the content of the phone call, it was also a complaint. The front desk kept apologizing and said to upgrade the room. OMG, is Hilton this bad now? By the way, there are really too few options for breakfast, and it‚Äôs not worth the breakfast fee when booking a hotel. It‚Äôs better to go to takeaway and spend 20 yuan for breakfast. Anyway, I will not choose Hilton again. It is a reference for friends who choose a hotel.

Except for the big room and the proximity to Wangfujing Pedestrian Street, everything else is hard to say. After all, it costs more than 1,000 a night, and the experience is too bad. When other hotels check out, the deposit will be refunded together. We will refund it after one day. We call the hotel and tell us that it will take 1-3 days. If we don‚Äôt give up, we will call the hotel again ask, hey

msg:Hilton Wangfujing is my first choice every time I come to Beijing. It not only has a superior location and good environmental services, but also has humanized management that responds to customers' needs and gives a sense of security.
Today I suddenly felt unwell, so I called the front desk and asked if there were any simple disinfection products. The concierge manager Yu Yong immediately brought a box of various medicines and disinfection products. Yu Yong observed that something was wrong, so he called 120 immediately , Manager Zhang Ling at the front desk, Manager Deng of the Security Depar**ent and Zhang Bin, the supervisor, also came to help one after another. Because I came to Beijing alone, the hotel arranged for Yu Yong to accompany me to the hospital. The hospital ran back and forth upstairs and downstairs. He speeded up his pace and ran out of breath to take care of me for all kinds of checks paid for by registration. The feeling of loneliness, helplessness and pain caused by a sudden illness in a foreign country was completely warmed by the service of Hilton Wangfujing Hotel. Thank you very much!

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Deluxe Plus
info:Stayed in June 2023
info:Family
info:18 Reviews
rating:2.5
posted:Posted June 24, 2023
msg:It is necessary to evaluate the Hilton Hotel where I stayed during the Dragon Boat Festival, so that future friends can avoid stepping on the pit! ! !
1. The hotel is located in Wangfujing, the center of Beijing, with convenient transportation and convenient access to various scenic spots. The location is really good, this must be confirmed!
2. The room service has to complain. A family of three stayed in the room. There were only two pairs of slippers that did not match the reputation of Hilton, and there were only two pairs, and there were only two toothbrushes. I called room service and waited for a long time. After urging again, it was delivered!
3. I endured it on the first day, but I didn‚Äôt expect it to be the same on the second day. When I went back to the hotel at night, there was still no toothbrush for children!
4. Not much to say about the condition of the room. It is old and dilapidated. The floor of the room squeaks and the air conditioner switch is placed in a gap. To turn on the air conditioner and adjust the temperature, you need to turn on the flashlight of your mobile phone to illuminate it!
5. The lobby of the hotel is too small, it doesn't look like the lobby of a five-star hotel!
6. The following is very important for smokers: smoking is prohibited anywhere in the hotel. When you check in, the front desk will tell you that the fine for smoking in the hotel is 900 yuan. If you want to smoke, you must smoke outside the hotel. I insist on smoking outside the hotel Smoked for three days!
7. Let‚Äôs talk about the breakfast. The room I booked includes two breakfasts, and breakfast for children is added. The hotel‚Äôs name is 120 yuan a day after a 50% discount. To be honest, the money is not much, but the meals are not satisfactory. Breakfast is almost the same every day for three days, with few varieties and very average taste!
8. I have lived in many Hilton hotels across the country, and none of them is like this Hilton, which allows you to spend the money of a five-star hotel, but you can appreciate the feeling of staying in a hotel for 300 yuan!
9. One more thing to add. I bought some small things and called the hotel to ask for two handbags. The other party replied that I had to apply to see if it would work. Although it was delivered to the room in the end, it is a five-star hotel, this layout!
       So friends who plan to book a stay at this hotel, I hope my true feelings can help you make a choice! ! !

msg:I came to Beijing on the 16th. I stayed at the Renaissance Jinmao Hotel on the first day, and stayed at the Hilton Wangfujing Hotel for a whole week from the second day. The front desk of the hotel upgraded me to an executive double room. The room is spacious and comfortable, and there is also a cloakroom. The temperature difference in Beijing in autumn and winter is very large. It is as warm as summer in the hotel, but it is cold when you go out at night. When staying in the hotel, the biggest problem I encountered was the pop-up window of Beijing Healthbao. On the first day of landing, I had to go to the designated hospital for nucleic acid testing, and the surrounding roadsides were not allowed to do it. The key is that Beijing still doesn't allow public transportation. Could it be possible to walk to the hospital three kilometers away? After overcoming numerous difficulties, the nucleic acid was finally completed. On the third day, I asked the front desk to report to the community for decoding, but I didn‚Äôt expect to refuse, saying that the time difference was not up, and I was asked to wait until the fourth day to report, I was really speechless! This computing power is enough for the Nise Hotel to be heavily guarded, and the venue code must be strictly scanned for entry and exit. I stayed in Beijing for a week with trepidation, and fled in a hurry when the epidemic was getting worse day by day. After I and a large number of guests left the hotel, the hotel also announced that it was temporarily closed.

posted:Posted September 25, 2022
msg:I was a little disappointed when I first stepped into the hotel lobby, and the hardware is a bit different compared to other Hilton hotels I have stayed in. I was also a little absent-minded when I checked in. The little girl Zhu Siyue who received me was very warm and professional. After reading my reservation information, she smiled and said to me that in order to celebrate my 30th wedding anniversary, the staff of the hotel room depar**ent specially I decorated the room, and the catering depar**ent also prepared small cakes for us. If you need any help during your stay, you can call her at any time, and hand over her business card. I didn't expect that I had already done so much for me before I checked into the hotel, and my previous concerns disappeared. Since I booked an executive room, the hotel has a lot of benefits. Children Zhu Siyue introduced them to me one by one. I was afraid that I could not remember and wrote down some important information carefully. She was as patient as her own family. Thank you very much for her work for me do everything.
The staff in the executive lounge are very friendly and the service is in place. The fly in the oin**ent is that there are too few types of afternoon tea snacks. There are only two kinds of cookies and lollipops. Of course, the taste of cookies is very strong, crispy and delicious, very popular. All are welcome. The fruits are only apples, pears and winter jujubes, and the whole apples and pears are placed there, which is really inconvenient for guests to eat.
The breakfast is also good, especially the lye bread and croissants are delicious. The guy in the gray suit in the restaurant told me that if I like it, I can buy it separately in the bakery in the lobby. After hearing his words, I went to buy bread to take home before leaving the store.
This stay at the hotel really brought me a lot of surprises, and the staff's work is also very professional and perfect. Thank you to all the staff who served us and made us have a wonderful weekend and special anniversary. Hope to enjoy your meticulous service and enthusiasm next time. Thanks again!

msg:No cheating, the picture is the same as the real thing.
I always thought that Wangfujing and Hilton were both "red in the sunset", but I didn't expect that the energy of "Wangfujing Hilton" would be so huge when they were put together. Surprisingly, the price of the suite is not high, but it is classic everywhere. The decoration is very new, and the Forbidden City can be seen from the window. I have to praise it. Jiang is still old and spicy.
Here has to mention a little thing when checking in. Because the check-out of the previous guests was delayed, the people in the lobby pushed us to Harry Liu Zehao, the manager of the executive lounge. Harry's professionalism made me take a high look at Hilton... For example, in the face of our anxiety, he took the initiative to find a suitable room to adjust; for example, when my friend and I took the elevator, he silently walked to another elevator to give us space . If Hilton doesn't give Harry a raise, I don't think it's justified. He has raised the grade of the entire hotel on his own.
In contrast, the service attitude and standard of several elder brothers in the lobby are a little irritating. But it doesn't matter, the hotel is still good. If you are also lucky enough to meet harry, then you may see the ceiling of the international five-star hotel service industry!

info:Deluxe King Room
info:Stayed in February 2023
info:Family
info:4 Reviews
rating:3.5
posted:Posted February 5, 2023
msg:The location is good, located next to Wangfujing Street, so traveling is relatively convenient. There are APM and Intime nearby, and there are many dining options. Jinyu Hutong or Wangfujing stations on Line 8 are not very far, you can reach them in just two steps. There is not enough space at the entrance of the hotel, so vehicles cannot stay for a long time and must just park and leave. The lobby is relatively small and can get crowded when there are many people checking in.
Double bed room with independent dressing room. The windows are quite big, but only two can be opened at a small angle, and outside is the roof of Union Hospital. The facilities are relatively old. The dressing mirror and tea cabinet have obvious signs of wear and cracking, and they make constant squeaking sounds when they are opened. There are few bedside facilities and there are no sockets on one side. It's so hot in the room, I don't know where the heat is coming from. Turn off the air conditioner and open the windows to the maximum, but you can still wear short-sleeves indoors. The quilt was so thick that I woke up sweaty at night, and the air humidity was low, making my sleeping experience very poor.
The bath was well received. There is a lot of water, and overhead shower facilities are not common, so it feels good.
Breakfast is not cheap, but the variety and taste are below average. I haven‚Äôt stayed at Hilton for a long time. When I was a child, I thought it was synonymous with high-end hotels. I wonder if it has declined in recent years.
----------------------------------------

msg:This weekend's staycation is at the Wangfujing Hilton, three days and two nights, and the room type is a 72-square-meter suite.
‚úÖLet's talk about the advantages first
1Ô∏è‚É£The service attitude of the front desk and customer manager has inherited the advantages of the old luxury hotels, and the basic and reasonable needs will be satisfied. Special thanks to Manager Elton Wang Zhedong for his meticulous service!
2Ô∏è‚É£The swimming pool is a highlight, especially at night, it is very popular, and it is suitable for punching cards. During the day, the view is wide and the swimming mood will become better.
3Ô∏è‚É£The location is unique, next to APM and Wangfujing Pedestrian Street downstairs, to meet various entertainment and shopping needs. Across the road is the subway entrance, which is convenient for travel.
‚ùå Not enough
1Ô∏è‚É£Breakfast is really confusing, boiled noodles, hard and crunchy fried dough sticks, all kinds of snacks and desserts that look like they have been stored for a long time. Really disappointing, fortunately the coffee and salad were ok.
2Ô∏è‚É£ The Qin Tang Chinese restaurant on the fifth floor of the hotel is always dark, I will not come by myself, and I will remind my friends not to come. During the meal, it was very unpleasant. I have already posted a 700-word long article on Dianping, so I won't say more here. Immediately after the meal, I complained to the account manager, and finally sent a fruit plate to express my apology.
3Ô∏è‚É£ The lighting in the suite is too poor, there are only two small windows, there is basically no direct sunlight from morning to night, and only the lights can be turned on.
In addition, I also experienced the SPA on the 6th floor of the hotel, summed up in four words: not very good, it is better than the chain beauty salons on the roadside, but because the SPA is outsourced by the Hilton Hotel, it is not self-operated by the hotel. Not much evaluation.
‚úÖSummary
As an old luxury hotel with just over 1,000 yuan, Hilton is still above average in all aspects and suitable for business travelers. But there are no impressive features in other aspects. Maybe no features are its features. Everything is quite satisfactory. You can say that it abides by its duties, or you can say that it is not satisfactory.

name:1‚Äç1‚Äç0‚Äç1‚Äç0‚Äç1‚Äç2‚Äç4‚Äç3‚Äç0
info:Deluxe Plus
info:Stayed in June 2021
info:Family
info:44 Reviews
rating:3
posted:Posted July 2, 2021
msg:It was the first time for a three-year-old baby to visit Beijing, and I chose the famous Wangfujing Hilton on the first night in Beijing. I originally wanted to make the children have a perfect travel experience, but I didn‚Äôt expect to encounter many unpleasant things on the first day of staying in the hotel, and even decided to check out the next morning and directly cancelled the hotel in the next few days. Order. The following is a pertinent and truthful list of the unsatisfactory things encountered. I hope that I can give you some reference. I also hope that the relevant hotel management staff can pay attention to further improve the management level and prevent the recurrence of similar incidents:
First, there was a long line at the front desk when we arrived at the hotel near noon. Due to the limited space in the lobby, we asked the children to find a place to sit down and wait in the lobby bar. As a result, he was relentlessly driven out by the staff and claimed that he could not be seated without spending. At the same time, a foreign mother and daughter came to take a seat in the lobby bar. The two did not spend any money. The hotel staff turned a blind eye and left it alone. Such a distinction between Chinese and foreign customers is unavoidable!
Second, after getting the room card, put the luggage into the room and then take the children out to eat. After lunch, I took the children back to the hotel to prepare for a nap. After pulling off the quilt, I found that there was an obvious stain on the sheets (see picture). After calling the hotel to give feedback, the front office manager and the person in charge of the guest room said that they needed to check in the room. After arriving in the guest room and seeing the stain, they asked, "Isn't you sure that the stain was not accidentally caused by you?". Fortunately, after a series of investigations, the hotel admitted that it was an internal washing machine problem that caused the bedding to be contaminated. If there is no result of the investigation, we are really confused. Those who do not understand the situation think that we deliberately soiled the sheets and corrupted others. If feasible, we really would rather pay out of our pockets to ask a third-party agency to come and appraise it to prove our innocence.
Third, the internal sanitation of the hotel room is worrying, and there are many uncleaned garbage near the sofa and desk (see picture). Reported the matter to the hotel, and was asked whether the room was robbed, and eloquently explained that the sanitation of the room that was tightly robbed might not be in place. We answered that we did not grab the room when we checked in, and the front desk arranged a room for us directly. The hotel front office manager immediately said that such a situation had never been seen before in the industry for so many years. To be honest, we have traveled almost all over China and the world, and have stayed in countless five-star hotels. This situation has never been encountered before!
Fourth, there is no regular inspection of room facilities and equipment. When I was about to turn off the lights at night, I found that there were still two lights in the aisle that could not be turned off after pressing the main power control switch. After studying for a long time, pressing all the power switches in the room back and forth several times did not help. In desperation, I could only call the service phone and let the hotel send a master to repair it. The master came to an inconspicuous corner of the wall and opened the power box for a while, saying that the contact was bad, and finally turned off the aisle lights.
It is no exaggeration to say that the one-night stay at the Wangfujing Hilton Hotel left us a very "unforgettable" impression, and it also made our trip to Beijing very unsatisfactory. In the future, when choosing a hotel, you should not consider any hotel under the Hilton Hotel Group!

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Deluxe Plus
info:Stayed in June 2021
info:Family
info:10 Reviews
rating:4
posted:Posted June 14, 2021
msg:The hotel is in a good location and travel is very convenient. The overall hardware facilities also reflect the standard of an established five-star hotel. The super deluxe double room is very spacious, and the cloakroom, bathroom and work area are all satisfactory. The buffet restaurant is also more spacious and has a richer selection of dishes. The swimming pool is also good, but the changing room is too small.

But compared to hardware, the hotel's management services are hard to compliment. On the day of check-in, at the agreed check-in time at 15:00, the hotel‚Äôs front desk still stated that the room was not cleaned, saying that there were too many guests and tight staff. It also stated that if you want to check in immediately, you can upgrade the suite by paying the difference (instead of free upgrade). The front desk staff is stiff and unapologetic. It seems that they have never heard of the rules of the global hotel (!). It was not until the person in charge on duty was found to make serious negotiations that he immediately transferred a cleaned room to move in. It can be seen that the rooms are not without. As for why the delay? do not know.

When I went out the next morning and returned to the hotel to rest at 3 pm, I found that the room hadn't been cleaned. I called twice and waited for about half an hour before the waiter was invited. In addition, there are personal belongings left by previous guests in the hotel cupboards, which shows that the guest rooms were not cleaned carefully.

In addition, there are no umbrellas in the hotel rooms. When it rains, you need to borrow an umbrella after registering at the front desk. There is a gap with the service of a five-star hotel. Does it mean that the Hilton brand has declined?

The attitude of the room attendants is very good, I guess they are also very hard, they should be limited in manpower. The problem is that during the holiday season, the passenger flow is relatively large (visual observation is not particularly large), and the service force is in short supply. Does the management party have no anticipation and response?
